Name: Rieger-C2 Module
Description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Module (Passive)

Optimal Charge Window: +8%
Resistance: +5%

The Rieger-C2 Module modifies a mining laser's targeting system to locate and exploit micro-fractures within a deposit. Although the deposit's resistance is increased, the optimal charge safe-zone for the deposit is increased.
